title: HIGH & MIGHTY 515314 Picture Hanger Value Pack, Easy Tool-Free Dry Wall Art Hangers for Artwork, Photos, and Mirrors, Holds up to 20Lbs-40Lbs, 8 Pack, Steel , Silver
description: What has two thumbs and can hang anything? You do. HIGH & MIGHTY wall hangers are easy to install without a single tool—simply place, push, and hang. With just your thumbs, you can quickly go from inspiration to installation. Our hangers come in a variety of weights so there's a solution for anything you want to hang, no matter how big. Pictures, mirrors, wall decor, or even a gallery wall go up in seconds. Removing or replacing HIGH & MIGHTY is easily done with a flathead screwdriver or something similar, leaving holes barely bigger than a pin. Designed for use with sawtooth and ring style mounts or picture wire. With this value 8-pack, hang up to 20lbs or up to 40lbs on each hook, depending on the hook, and show off your family photos, artwork, clocks, diplomas, and other home décor. Will also hang many office cork boards, chalk boards, and dry-erase board frames. For use on drywall only.
